detailedDesc: The guard looks very tough and mean.  He wears his beard long, and he The guard looks very tough and mean.  He wears his beard long, and he smells like he hasn't bathed in over a month.

longDesc: A dwarven mining worker is here.
detailedDesc: He is very dirty, and looks extremely over-worked. He is very dirty, and looks extremely over-worked.

longDesc: A wraith is awaiting your first move here.
detailedDesc: A black, almost transparent wraith. A black, almost transparent wraith.

longDesc: The Hide & Tooth storekeeper is standing here, waiting patiently.
detailedDesc: The storekeeper is very rotund, but looks in excellent condition. The storekeeper is very rotund, but looks in excellent condition.

longDesc: Granite Head, the baker, is waiting for a customer here.
detailedDesc: Granite Head is covered with flour and grains. Granite Head is covered with flour and grains.

longDesc: A giant lizard is foraging for food along the cavern floor here.
detailedDesc: This scaly creature looks like it is well adapted to its underground This scaly creature looks like it is well adapted to its underground habitat.  He looks very powerful.

longDesc: A giant is wandering around the mountainside here.
detailedDesc: The giant is about 18 feet tall, with arms of steel, and looks in The giant is about 18 feet tall, with arms of steel, and looks in excellent physical condition.
The mineworker is very tired, and very dirty, and he has bulging muscles. The mineworker is very tired, and very dirty, and he has bulging muscles.

longDesc: A dwarven mine leader is here, supervising the work.
detailedDesc: The mine leader is very big and very strong, though he must be fairly The mine leader is very big and very strong, though he must be fairly bright also, to have gotten this job.

longDesc: The dwarven doctor is here, aiding the sick of his people.
detailedDesc: He is a very skilled healer, and extremely faithful to his god. He is a very skilled healer, and extremely faithful to his god.

longDesc: A dwarven peon is awaiting help here.
A barrack guard is here, lounging around while off duty.

detailedDesc: He looks VERY tough. He looks VERY tough.

longDesc: There is a giant snake here.
